channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Scribe/Collector
channel.description:
Scribe - BD invest
Passive: Royal Blood - You can step up to be king.
Day ability: Identify Items - Check if your target has a day ability. (unlimited)
Night ability: Read List - See if your target had a duplicate at the start of the game. (unlimited)
Collector - Unseen Offensive
Passive: Royal Blood - You can step up to be king.
Day ability: Confiscate items - Your target can't use their day ability's today. You can't target the king with this. (3 uses)
Night ability 1: Identify contraband - See how many uses of limited use ability's your target has. (unlimited) Night ability 2: Confiscate contraband - Remove a use of each limited use ability your target has. You can't target the king with this. (1 uses)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Scribe/Collector
item.dc:creator: Michael_Tawney
item.description:
That confiscate contraband seems way too powerful. You could rob priest rez as an example. It could be a one touch win button in a lot of cases.

I really like the concept. I’d keep it 1 time use though.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Scribe/Collector
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Most classes such as CW and Fool can spawn twice in a single game. The ability Checks to see if the target had someone else at the start of the game. Meaning that if your target is a physician then you would know if there were 2 physicians or not. Thought unless he dies he could be a MM or something.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Scribe/Collector
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Night ability: Read List - See if your target had a duplicate at the start of the game. (unlimited)

I did not understand @_@

Read full topic
